column4: Okay, I just got the latest Humble Indie Bundle, and it gives the option to install software via the Ubuntu Software Center.  When I click the "Download for Ubuntu" button, I'm presented with a dialog that prompts me to open the download link with xdg-open.  When I click, nothing happens, it just opens a chromium window with a blank tab.  How do I get it to install correctly?
the default firefox has an addon that opens apt:// URLS (or something like that)
